description.full_description:
SurgicalPrep is the ultimate study companion for surgical technologists, OR nurses, and surgical technology students. Master surgical instruments, create preference cards, and track your learning progress with our comprehensive study tools.

ðŸ“š INSTRUMENT DATABASE
â€¢ Browse 200+ surgical instruments across all specialties
â€¢ High-quality images with zoom capability
â€¢ Detailed descriptions, uses, and handling notes
â€¢ Full-text search and category filtering
â€¢ Common procedures and aliases for each instrument

ðŸ“‹ PREFERENCE CARDS
â€¢ Create digital preference cards for any procedure
â€¢ Add instruments from our database or custom items
â€¢ Organize by surgeon, procedure, and specialty
â€¢ Attach setup photos for visual reference
â€¢ Duplicate and customize existing cards
â€¢ Access template cards for common procedures

ðŸ§  STUDY TOOLS
â€¢ Flashcard mode with swipe-to-learn interface
â€¢ Multiple choice quizzes with instant feedback
â€¢ Spaced repetition algorithm for optimal retention
â€¢ Track your progress and study streaks
â€¢ Review instruments due for practice

âœ¨ PREMIUM FEATURES
â€¢ Unlimited preference cards (Free: 5 cards)
â€¢ Unlimited daily quizzes (Free: 3/day)
â€¢ Access to all instrument details
â€¢ Priority support

Perfect for:
â€¢ Surgical Technologists preparing for certification
â€¢ CST exam preparation
â€¢ OR Nurses expanding their knowledge
â€¢ Surgical Technology students
â€¢ Healthcare professionals in the operating room

Start your surgical prep journey today!

Questions or feedback? Contact us at support@surgicalprep.app
description.promotional_text: Master surgical instruments with flashcards, quizzes, and digital preference cards. Perfect for surgical techs, OR nurses, and students!
description.keywords: surgical instruments,scrub tech,preference cards,flashcards,CST exam,OR nursing,surgery,medical

demo_account.notes: This demo account has premium access enabled for review purposes.

app_review_information.notes: SurgicalPrep is an educational app for surgical technologists and OR nurses to study surgical instruments and create preference cards. It does not provide medical advice or store patient data. The app requires an account to save user progress and preference cards.

in_app_purchases.description: Unlock unlimited preference cards, unlimited quizzes, and full instrument details.
Save 50%! Unlock unlimited preference cards, unlimited quizzes, and full instrument details for a full year.

ipad_12_9_inch.content: Same as iPhone, optimized for iPad layout

export_compliance.notes: App uses HTTPS for network communication (standard TLS). No custom encryption algorithms. ITSAppUsesNonExemptEncryption is set to false.
